dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: To upcycle the degraded NMC532 (Li1-xNi0.5Mn0.3Co0.2O2) into Ni66-NMC, 0.2 mol of the degraded NMC532 cathode powder (?20 g, a mixture of NMC532, carbon black, and polymer binder) was mixed with 0.2 mol Ni0.83Mn0.09Co0.08(OH)2, 0.5 mol LiOH, and 0.1 mol Li2SO4 and transferred into a crucible. LiOH was in excess (excess % = (1.5 ? x)/(1 + x)) to facilitate complete re-lithiation, which is a self-saturated process according to the literature.1 The crucible used for the reaction was loosely covered by a lid to allow air intake during the synthesis but avoid excess evaporation of Li salts. The material mixture was heated to 900℃ at aram pin g r a t e o f ?10℃ min-1 and held at 900℃ for 5 h and then at 860℃ for 15h in air before slow cooling at a rate of 2℃ min-1 to 300℃. The carbon black and the poly merbinder were burned away during the high-temperature MSDR process. After that, the mixture was allowed to cool down naturally. The obtained powders were recovered from the crucible, ground in an agate mortar, and washed using deionized water to separate the material from the water-soluble Li salts, which could be recycled after water evaporation and reused. The Ni66-NMC powder was collected by centrifugation and dried at 70℃ in air before being thermally treated at 700℃ for 4 h in air. T h e powder was ground again to pass through a 400-mesh sieve and then stored in a humidity-controlled storage chamber before further tests. To upcycle the degraded NMC532 into Ni80-NMC via MSDR, 0.2 mol of the degraded NMC532 cathode powder (?20 g) was mixed with 0.3 mol Ni(OH)2, 0.625 mol LiOH, and 0.125 mol Li2SO4 and transferred into a crucible. The experimental procedures were the same as those for the Ni66-NMC, except the sintering temperature was lowered to 780℃.

为了将降解的NMC532（Li1-xNi0.5Mn0.3Co0.2O2）上循环为Ni66 NMC，将0.2摩尔的降解NMC532阴极粉末（？20克，NMC532、炭黑和聚合物粘合剂的混合物）与0.2摩尔的Ni0.83Mn0.09Co0.08（OH）2、0.5摩尔的LiOH和0.1摩尔的Li2SO4混合，并转移到坩埚中。LiOH过量（过量%=（1.5？x）/（1+x））以促进完全的再锂化，根据文献，这是一个自饱和过程。1用于反应的坩埚被盖子松散地覆盖，以允许在合成过程中吸入空气，但避免Li盐的过度蒸发。将材料混合物在芳纶pingrateof？下加热至900℃？10℃min-1，在900℃下保温5h，然后在860℃下保温15h，然后以2℃min-1至300℃的速率缓慢冷却。炭黑和聚merbinder在高温MSDR过程中被烧掉。之后，使混合物自然冷却。将获得的粉末从坩埚中回收，在玛瑙研钵中研磨，并使用去离子水洗涤，以将材料与水溶性Li盐分离，水溶性锂盐可在水蒸发后回收并重复使用。通过离心收集Ni66 NMC粉末，并在空气中在70℃下干燥，然后在空气中700℃下热处理4h。再次研磨粉末以通过400目筛，然后在进一步测试之前储存在湿度控制的储存室中。为了通过MSDR将降解的NMC532上循环为Ni80 NMC，将0.2摩尔降解的NMC 532阴极粉末（20g）与0.3摩尔Ni(OH)20.625摩尔LiOH和0.125摩尔Li2SO4混合，并转移到坩埚中。实验程序与Ni66 NMC相同，只是烧结温度降低到780℃。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: 333.9 kg of the degraded NMC532 can be sorted from per 1 ton of degraded battery

technology.technologicalApplicability: The molten-salt-based direct recycling (MSDR) method described is employed to upcycle degraded NMC532 cathode materials into high-nickel content lithium-nickel-manganese-cobalt oxides (Ni66-NMC and Ni80-NMC). These recycled cathode materials are specifically designed for use in the production of Ni-rich cathode materials for lithium-ion batteries. This process ensures the efficient recovery and reuse of valuable metals from spent batteries, contributing to the sustainability of the battery production industry.
所描述的熔盐基直接回收（MSDR）方法用于将降解的NMC532阴极材料上循环为高镍含量的锂镍锰钴氧化物（Ni66-NMC和Ni80-NMC）。这些回收的阴极材料专门用于生产锂离子电池的富镍阴极材料。该过程确保了从废旧电池中高效回收和再利用宝贵金属，为电池生产行业的可持续发展做出贡献。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: ① We calculated the cost per one ton of recycled cathode materials. The recycle process can be divided into two steps: DISASSEMBLE degraded battery & RECYLCE to produce Ni-rich cathode materials.② During the DISASSEMBLE process, we use degraded NMC532 as raw material.③ During the RECYLCE process, only Ni and Co is added.
① 我们计算了每吨回收阴极材料的成本。回收过程可分为两个步骤：拆解退化电池和回收生产富镍正极材料。② 在拆卸过程中，我们使用降级的NMC532作为原材料。③ 在回收生成过程中，只添加Ni和Co。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Qian, G. et al. Value-creating upcycling of retired electric vehicle battery cathodes. Cell Reports Physical Science 3, 100741 (2022).
Qian, G. et al. Value-creating upcycling of retired electric vehicle battery cathodes. Cell Reports Physical Science 3, 100741 (2022).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this LCA dataset should ensure that they account for the specific inputs and outputs associated with the MSDR process when conducting life cycle assessments. It is crucial to include the amounts of Ni, Mn, and Co added during the recycling process, as well as the energy consumption and emissions during the disassembly and recovery stages. Additionally, the environmental benefits of the water-soluble Li salts recovery should be considered. The MSDR method is a high-temperature process, and the effects of carbon black and polymer binder combustion on the overall environmental impact must be evaluated. Finally, the changes in sintering temperature between Ni66-NMC and Ni80-NMC recycling should be reflected in the analysis to accurately represent their respective impacts.

该生命周期评估（LCA）数据集的使用者应确保在进行生命周期评估时计入与MSDR过程相关的特定输入和输出。至关重要的是要纳入在回收过程中添加的Ni、Mn和Co的数量，以及在拆解和回收阶段的能源消耗和排放。此外，应考虑水溶性锂盐回收的环境效益。MSDR方法是一个高温过程，炭黑和聚合物粘结剂燃烧对总体环境影响的效果必须评估。最后，分析中应反映Ni66-NMC和Ni80-NMC回收之间烧结温度的变化，以准确代表它们各自的影响。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
